name: IG Capital
overview: IG Capital Corp. Casa de Valores is a Broker Dealer duly registered and regulated by the Comisi√≥n Nacional de Valores de Panama. It was created with the aim of supporting the financial needs of individual investors, domestic and international corporations and small and medium industry. IG Capital is a financial institution that offers high quality advice, backed by professionals with extensive experience in the stock market, ready to serve each customer individually to support their financial needs. They believe in the ability to deliver long-term performance is the true measure of their success.
